Blog Posts Optimized for Learning


Melodies: Create Unexpected Note Climaxes

August 23, 2018 | Nick Mazuk

There are a multitude of techniques to creating climaxes in melody. And the more techniques you have in your toolkit, the more variety you’ll get and the more nuanced your melodies.

So today I’m going to give you a powerful tool that is easy to use and will add harmonic and pitch variety to your melody.

And that is the unexpected note climax.
